iOS.title: Feature checklist
list: Does the project compile on the latest Xcode?
Does the project support required iOS versions?
Is project completed as per requirement?

iOS.title: Architecture checklist
list: Is the code almost free of IUO (implicitly-unwrapped optional)?
Does the code properly use safe unwrapping?
Is there some basic error handling in place?
Is view-related code in the views?
Does the View Controller contain too much logic?
Is it easy to implement a new network endpoint?
Is Xcode has proper file structure?
Is Xcode file structure mimic the system's?
Does the App Delegate contain any business logic?
Does table:cell contains any business logic?
Does app uses Dependency Injection or Singleton?

iOS.title: Others
list: Does app has proper naming convention?
